title: other sign in methods if passkey is enabled
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I cant login anymore when i enable my passkeys in Microsoft.  It defaults to my pin/fingerprint login but i cant select a other sign in method.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A extra option to sign in via a other methode when passkey is trying?

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Removing my passkey but it is also useful for other applications/web based login


EDIT: 
Apparently it selects my last login method as default. If i login somewhere else through other means, the teams-linux client will remember that somehow.
